name: In the Matter of Nicole Primas GAINES Candidate for Representative in the General Assembly from the 24th Legislative District. Appeal of Joseph PRESTON
docket_number: Appeal, No. 139 Middle District Appeal Docket 1998

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: In the Matter of Nicole Primas GAINES Candidate for Representative in the General Assembly from the 24th Legislative District. Appeal of Joseph PRESTON.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 14th day of October, 1998, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John J. Connelly, Jr., Harrisburg, for Joseph Preston.
Anthony J. Foschi, Camp Hill, for Nicole Primas Gaines.
Dick Filling, Commissioner, Info-Bureau of Elections.
casebody.head_matter:
718 A.2d 296
In the Matter of Nicole Primas GAINES Candidate for Representative in the General Assembly from the 24th Legislative District. Appeal of Joseph PRESTON.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Sept. 28, 1998.
Decided Oct. 14, 1998.
John J. Connelly, Jr., Harrisburg, for Joseph Preston.
Anthony J. Foschi, Camp Hill, for Nicole Primas Gaines.
Dick Filling, Commissioner, Info-Bureau of Elections.
D. Michael Fisher, Attorney General.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
